name: Portfolio Website
desc: A modern portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features smooth animations, responsive design, and interactive elements.

name: Todo App
desc: A feature-rich Todo application for Android. Includes local storage, notifications, and a clean Material Design interface.

name: Weather App
desc: A weather application that provides real-time weather information using OpenWeatherMap API. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: E-commerce Platform
desc: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with PHP and MySQL. Includes user authentication, product management, and secure payment integration.
